CLINIQUE Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel

Brand: Clinique

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Limonene, Linalool, Citral, Citronellol, Geraniol, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Develo
LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
